events.message: Applicant submitted the loan application seeking funds for covering medical expenses as well as consolidating some personal debt.
The application was categorized under Personal Loan due to mention of medical and personal debt purposes in the request.
Assigned loan officer contacted the applicant to introduce themselves and confirm documentation needs for processing.
Initial review completed, showing applicant has a steady income but a moderate existing debt load that requires careful risk assessment.
Requested detailed bank statements and medical expense receipts to verify applicant’s financial situation and loan purpose.
Applicant provided all requested documents on time, including bank statements and detailed medical bills as requested.
Credit check showed fair credit score with a history of on-time loan repayments but current outstanding personal debts noted.
Risk assessment balanced applicant’s current debt and income, concluding the loan carries moderate risk pending final officer review.
Loan offer presented to applicant outlining terms including interest rate, repayment schedule, and fees for the requested personal loan.
Applicant responded positively expressing understanding of terms and willingness to proceed with the loan offer as proposed.
Application escalated to senior loan manager for approval due to applicant’s existing debt load requiring additional review.
Senior manager approved the loan application after confirming all conditions met and assessing the applicant’s repayment ability.
Loan was funded as per agreement and the funds were transferred to the applicant’s bank account successfully.
Follow-up with the applicant confirmed satisfaction with loan process and initial repayment plans have been set up smoothly.
The loan application file was formally closed after ensuring all post-funding steps were completed and documented properly.
